languages.text: {n}Вздыбленные огненные волосы опускаются, печать смерти пропадает из взгляда Ульфара. Морда дикого зверя сменяется гримасой, полной усталости, горя... и стыда.{/n}
{n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair lies flat once more and the imprint of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief, and... shame.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вздыбленные огненные волосы опускаются, печать смерти пропадает из взгляда Ульфара. Морда дикого зверя сменяется гримасой, полной усталости, горя... и стыда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair comes to rest, and the inevitability of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief... and shame.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La crinière rousse d'Ulfar retombe, et le spectre de la mort disparaît de son regard. Le visage de la bête sauvage laisse transparaître de la lassitude, du chagrin et... de la honte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair lies flat once more and the imprint of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief, and... shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La crinière rousse d'Ulfar retombe, et la résignation face à l'inéluctabilité de la mort disparaît de son regard. Le visage de la bête sauvage laisse transparaître de la lassitude, du chagrin et... de la honte.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法原本根根竖立的火红头发伏了下来，死亡的意味从他的目光中消失了。那张宛如野兽的脸再次变成了痛苦的人脸，写满了疲惫、悲伤……与耻辱。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair lies flat once more and the imprint of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief, and... shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法原本根根竖立的火红头发伏了下来，死亡的意味从他的目光中消失了。那张宛如野兽的脸再次变成了痛苦的人脸，写满了疲惫、悲伤……与耻辱。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの燃えるような髪が再び落ち着き、そのまなざしから死をもたらすオーラが消えた。野獣の顔に疲労と悲嘆と…羞恥が混じった険しい表情が浮かんだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair lies flat once more and the imprint of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief, and... shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの燃えるような髪が再び落ち着き、そのまなざしから死をもたらすオーラが消えた。野獣の顔に疲労と悲嘆と…羞恥が混じった険しい表情が浮かんだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars feurige Haarmähne legt sich und aus seinem Blick verschwindet der Ausdruck des Todes. Das Gesicht einer wilden Bestie weicht einer müden Grimasse voller Trauer ... und Scham.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair lies flat once more and the imprint of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief, and... shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars feurige Haarmähne legt sich und aus seinem Blick verschwindet die Unvermeidlichkeit des Todes. Das Gesicht einer wilden Bestie weicht einer müden Grimasse. Sie zeigt Trauer ... und Scham.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los cabellos erizados de Ulfar se aplanan y la muerte se desvanece de su mirada. El semblante de bestia salvaje da paso a una mueca de fatiga, pesar... y vergüenza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair lies flat once more and the imprint of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief, and... shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los cabellos erizados de Ulfar se distienden, y la inevitabilidad de la muerte se desvanece de su mirada. El semblante de bestia salvaje da paso a una mueca de fatiga, pesar... y vergüenza.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın sık ve ateş kırmızısı saçları yeniden düzleşiyor, ölümün bakışlarında bıraktığı iz kayboluyor. Vahşi bir hayvanı andıran yüz ifadesi kaybolurken yerine yorgunluk, keder ve utançla ekşimiş bir yüz geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's bristling fiery hair lies flat once more and the imprint of death vanishes from his gaze. The face of a wild beast gives way to a grimace of weariness, grief, and... shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın sık ve ateş kırmızısı saçları yeniden düzleşiyor, ölümün bakışlarında bıraktığı iz kayboluyor. Vahşi bir hayvanı andıran yüz ifadesi kaybolurken yerine yorgunluk, keder ve utançla ekşimiş bir yüz geliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
